subject: Golf
PGA Championship
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Now a superstar on the PGA Tour, the young Phil Mickelson had close and rewarding friendships with a series of elite, aspiring golfers who did not attain similar success.
snippet: Now a superstar on the PGA Tour, the young Phil Mickelson had close and rewarding friendships with a series of elite, aspiring golfers who did not attain similar success.
